name: soundcloud-downloader
title: SoundCloud Downloader
description: Download SoundCloud tracks as single MP3 files with embedded artwork and metadata
author: laurenschristian

commands.name: soundcloud-downloader
commands.title: Download SoundCloud Track
commands.description: Download SoundCloud tracks as single MP3 files with embedded artwork and metadata

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
